title: Introduction to Climate Change Impacts in Timor-Leste's Urban Areas

questions.question: What is the projected increase in mean annual temperature for Timor-Leste by 2050?

What is the urban heat island effect?
choices: A cooling phenomenon in coastal cities
The warming of urban areas compared to surrounding rural areas
A meteorological event unique to tropical islands
The effect of air conditioning on urban temperatures
questions.answer: The warming of urban areas compared to surrounding rural areas

questions.question: Which of the following is NOT a cause of the urban heat island effect in Timorese cities?
choices: Lack of vegetation and green spaces
Proximity to large bodies of water
questions.answer: Proximity to large bodies of water
